channel.title: q-bio.TO updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: q-bio.TO updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A mathematical perspective on the paradox that chemotherapy sometimes works backwards
item.description: arXiv:2503.10670v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Doctors are well aware that sometimes cancer treatments not only fail, but even work backwards, i.e. they make the treated tumor grow. In this work we present a mathematical perspective on this paradox in the case of chemotherapy, by studying a minimally parameterized mathematical model for the system composed of the tumor and the surrounding vasculature. To this end, we will use a system of two well-established nonlinear ordinary differential equations, which incorporates the cytotoxic (via the Norton-Simon hypothesis) and antiangiogenic effects of chemotherapy. Finally, we provide two theoretical ways to avoid these anomalies.
item.dc:creator: Luis A. Fern\'andez, Isabel Lasheras, Cecilia Pola
